content.en: Agent control: Researchers are exploring ways to control the behavior of uncontrollable agents in multi-agent systems. They are designing algorithms that can influence these agents and improve their performance. Additionally, they are investigating the application of machine learning algorithms to multi-agent systems and studying the strengths and weaknesses of different algorithms in various domains. The goal is to develop effective and efficient learning methods for agents in complex environments.
content.da: Agentkontrol: Forskere undersøger måder at kontrollere adfærden af ukontrollerbare agenter i multi-agent systemer. De designer algoritmer, der kan påvirke disse agenter og forbedre deres ydeevne. Derudover undersøger de anvendelsen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer på multi-agent systemer og studerer styrkerne og svaghederne ved forskellige algoritmer i forskellige domæner. Målet er at udvikle effektive og effektive læringsmetoder for agenter i komplekse miljøer.
